name: PM Orchestrator
description: Project management and agent coordination. Spawns sub-agents for complex tasks.

name: Designer (Morpheus)
description: UX/UI design specs, wireframes, accessibility audits, and visual testing.

name: Coder
description: Implementation, bug fixes, and feature development.

name: Test Case Writer
description: Generates Playwright test cases from UX specs.

name: Validator
description: Runs tests, validates deployments, and generates reports.

name: Visual Test Agent
description: Percy visual regression testing and screenshot verification.

name: Candi
description: Restaurant reservation assistant via Bland AI phone calls.
